query: "Marks Work Warehouse in Burnaby Marine Way"

places.name: Mark's
places.address: Mark's, 7250 Market Crossing CRU 11B, Burnaby, BC V5J 0A2

featured_reviews.review_id:
Wow experience!!

"GIVE HIM A RAISE KINDA EXPERIENCE"- "Sumit"- Very patient and great customer service. Very helpful in finding the right size of shoe.

Cashier Lucia, great customer service skills.
Manager, Daniel -  Well done

All this when the store is really busy for Pre-Black Friday sale.

Always coming back to this location.

And Yes. I definitely recommend everyone!
featured_reviews.review_text:

featured_reviews.review_id:
actually a good place! normal tshirts and soft shirts for girls. they have also assortment of jeans for men! like a loooooot! The fitting room is also clean. The place is very organized. does not stink at all or anything like that. hehe...yes some places don't realize their store stinks or the fitting room stinks. you need to ask for assistance when you use the fitting room.

they have also shoes, pet leashes/harness/toy, work clothes, and such. good they had the BUY 1 GET 1 FREE. the staff was kind enough to match the prices to get us better prices. YEY!

i would never come here for anything else but it was a.good deal since everywhere else is getting expensive just for soft shirts for women, dresses and etc.

i will probably watch out for another set of their deals.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is one of the mark's biggest branches I have ever seen. They have a big collection and variety of footwear and clothes from safety ones to a normal casual garments. However when I was looking for safety glasses, the one I can wear it in the top of my prescription glasses I couldn't found, seems to be an issue in all Mark's located in Vancouver.
featured_reviews.review_text: This is one of the mark's biggest branches I have ever seen. They have a big collection and variety of footwear and clothes from safety ones to a normal casual garments. However when I was looking for safety glasses, the one I can wear it in the top of my prescription glasses I couldn't found, seems to be an issue in all Mark's located in Vancouver.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Very annoyed by Judi at the till. I told her my email was put in wrong, she skipped past email so I couldn't correct it. I mentioned it again and she said "you should tell me before the transaction." I told her I had, and then she said, "Oh, I didn't understand what you said.'  No apology!  I asked if there was a way to add it and she said not really, I'd have to do a return on everything.
1. She didn't listen
2. She told me I should have told her before. (I did)
and then she TELLS me, "oh I didn't understand what you said." Is that not the appropriate time to say "pardon me"?

I felt unheard, dismissed, and can't believe how rude some people can be in a customer service job!

Ms. Fancy
Level 7 Google Reviewer

featured_reviews.review_id: Went in to get new work pants, couldn't find anyone to help or around anywhere,  found that pants I wanted to try and was in the back looking for someone and a guy walked out from the back and I had asked if he could help with fitting room he then said I'm not working and went to the front desk to chat with his Co workers, I proceed to go to the front and ask one of the ladies and she pointed at the locked fitting room and said right over there, finally someone was helpfull and got the door open and managed to ring me out! Thus is probably the worst service marks there is out there I wouldn't recommend to anyone, also this is the 3rd time I've come with this kind of service!

featured_reviews.review_text: They have some good items for shopping. I have been had good experience also, its always easy to return if you dnt like or doesn't fit you.

featured_reviews.review_id: Went to get work boots for my son. Walked in and the male worker seen us there looking at the boots didn't acknowledge us if we needed a size or what we're looking for. I'm in the service industry too and not even pretending he wanted to help. If my son didn't need the boots right away I wouldn't of spent money in that place

featured_reviews.review_id: Mark's employees are very polite, helpful  and friendly.  Their store is very cleaned and  organized.
featured_reviews.review_text: Mark's employees are very polite, helpful  and friendly.  Their store is very cleaned and  organized.

places.name: Mark's
places.address: Mark's, Marine Plaza, 1076 Marine Dr, North Vancouver, BC V7P 1S5

featured_reviews.review_id: I have had two bad experiences in a row at Marks, both times attributable to very poor communication skills by staff who are basically almost hostile to customers.  I came in intending to use the $30 coupon I received on account of a prior purchase.  While we arrived close to closing time, it wasn't closing time yet and we made it there before the store's published closing time of 6 p.m.  We were rudely turned away.  My question as to what I could do with the coupon since it expired that day were met with a rude "we are closed".  When I said it wasn't six o'clock yet I was again met with a "we are closed".  When I asked whether I might be able to use the coupon online I was told "we are closed".  This is the second bad experience I have had in a row with this operation. Best $30 coupon I ever received because now I know not to come back and waste my money here.
featured_reviews.review_text: I have had two bad experiences in a row at Marks, both times attributable to very poor communication skills by staff who are basically almost hostile to customers. When I asked whether I might be able to use the coupon online I was told "we are closed".  This is the second bad experience I have had in a row with this operation. Best $30 coupon I ever received because now I know not to come back and waste my money here.

featured_reviews.review_id: This manager could not find anything to do but what felt like to me undress me with her eyes while I visited the location
featured_reviews.review_text: This manager could not find anything to do but what felt like to me undress me with her eyes while I visited the location

featured_reviews.review_id:
I am not reviewing this location but Mark's ONLINE. I bought a pair of shoes that I had to exchange for a different size. So far so good, Mark's even refunded the $ 8.00 freight. Next I printed the return instructions which clearly say , " due to cleaning procedures we are experiencing delays, processing may take UPTO 10 business days"
On Oct 6th , the 14th business day, after Can Post delivered my return, I phoned customer service and inquired about my refund.
The answer I received was  "It can take 30 days before processing your refund" When I protested and mentioned the "10 days" in the return instructions. I was told "if that's true can you email us a copy because that is "typing" mistake.  Really, a typing mistake on a preprinted automated return form ??? The moral of the story : if you are looking for a refund in a hurry Mark's is NOT the place to shop!

UPDATE:  October 16.
Called again today and was told it would be 30 BUSINESS days i.e.  6 weeks!!  Think about it before you decide to do your Christmas shopping at Marks online.... 6 weeks for a refund! That is after I paid good money to express mail the parcel back to them.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great experience at this Mark's location. Clean, bright interior and everything is well-stocked. I was looking for women's work gloves and hiking boots, and Brett gave an outstanding customer service. This will be our go-to Mark's from now on!

featured_reviews.review_id: This was my first visit to Mark's,  and I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff was professional and kind and the product selection was  terrific.   I got a great pair of rubber boots at a reasonable price, and they will last for years. I would recommend Mark's to everyone.
featured_reviews.review_text: This was my first visit to Mark's,  and I was pleasantly surprised.  The staff was professional and kind and the product selection was  terrific.   I got a great pair of rubber boots at a reasonable price, and they will last for years. I would recommend Mark's to everyone.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Scammers !! Poor Management !! Very bad experience today

Don't even try to sign up for their rewards card or program, they scammed us to offer rewards program and ended up signing up for their Mastercard. This is the employee that did this, she should be fired first. She offered us a rewards card to get a 15% off. She asked us our ID card, we gave and she did a credit check, opened a Mastercard in our name without our consent. She filed all fake info by herself, she did the authorize and submitted it. The so called "manager" on the side is her friend, she said she couldn't do anything. Don't ever go to these scammers. I'm complaining a law suit against these scammers.  She is being doing this to all of their customers. This should be stopped.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Went to look to see what kind of Rain Coats they had in stocks. I ended up getting a Windriver Rain Coat with a Hood for $120.00. It will keep me dry now when I'm waking the dog in the rain.
Staff was really polite and respectful. I asked her if she could cut the tags off, which she did for me. GoodcService and Friendly Staff.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Hello All....
I had very BAD experience at this Location...
I went there on wednesday to shop for shoes but didn't buy anything because of staff being specific- the girl with long hair and Name Tag "DILPREET".
I was having trouble to find Shoes and she was working in that area, she even looked at me but she was on phone and talking loudly all the time, she didn't even help me out and kept doing whatever she was doing.
I don't know if her Manager knows about this.. what are they getting paid for... God Nows
Very poor customer service.
Very Disappointing....
Will Never Go there Again...
If Manager is reading all these Reviews... Please have a chat with her about how to deal with customers... I will be glad to hear back....

featured_reviews.review_id: Clean, neat and nice store, good place to get  work apparel at affordable prices. A young employee, help me until I get the product I was looking for.
featured_reviews.review_text: Clean, neat and nice store, good place to get  work apparel at affordable prices. A young employee, help me until I get the product I was looking for.

featured_reviews.review_id: This is a busy Mark's, no question, but the staff was friendly and worked hard to move the line while giving each customer personalized service.  The male staff member at the counter even seemed to go over and above, calling a cross-city Mark's to check if that store had an item which a customer wanted.  When it came my turn, he thanked me for my patience and assured me he'd get me moving soon.  I liked that.  I was happy as well with the money I saved today.  $20 bucks off a pair of non-slip Sketchers for the workplace, plus an additional $8 off for joining Mark's online community (they send you a coupon)... basically left the store paying $75 tax included for a pretty decent pair of work shoes, normally $99 plus tax.   All in all, well worth the trip to Kingsgate Mall!

places.name: Winners & HomeSense
places.address: Winners & HomeSense, 5771 Marine Wy, Burnaby, BC V5J 0A6

featured_reviews.review_id: Complete rip off prices.  You can do better.  This store has the absolute worst customer service.  I had to ask 3 different employees for the price of something.  One said find one the same price and walked away.  Another said one minute and disappeared for a very long time and then I saw her just moving lamps around.  The other told me to wait also.  After waiting for a very long time she tried to tell me the price of a polyester dog bed was $49.  I told her no because that is a complete rip off.  Went down the way to the pet store in the same complex and they had the same beds for $27.  Do not waste your money here!

featured_reviews.review_id: Love coming to this place for interior decor. When the holidays come around it is the best place to get quality themed kitchen ware and decor. They have so many different options. From clothing to gym equipment to stationary. Find great things the more often you visit.
featured_reviews.review_text: Love coming to this place for interior decor. When the holidays come around it is the best place to get quality themed kitchen ware and decor. They have so many different options. From clothing to gym equipment to stationary. Find great things the more often you visit.

featured_reviews.review_id: lots of things to buy at a very good price!
featured_reviews.review_text: lots of things to buy at a very good price!

featured_reviews.review_id: Always enjoy the occasional shopping trip to Winners. This is a spacious store with plenty of parking. Dog-Friendly, too!
featured_reviews.review_text: Always enjoy the occasional shopping trip to Winners. This is a spacious store with plenty of parking. Dog-Friendly, too!

featured_reviews.review_id: My family and I had gone to this location on Mother's Day to look around. While we waited for my mom to do her shopping my dad and my sisters were looking at outdoor patio because we were interested in buying some for our backyard for the summer so we sat on a couple of the patio chairs to test it out and we were just enjoying ourselves saying how nice the furniture was. They had hats on the table and so we tired a couple while we waited. Then this lady rushes over and hovers and asks if we're done. We got up and left to go check out patio umbrellas. My dad was interested in a couple of them and wanted to see how they worked so he cracked the lever, safely and slowly, not causing an hard to anyone or anything, just genuinely wanted to see how it would open, and this same lady RUNS over and tells us we can't be touching things? We could see her watching us everywhere we would go shop and we felt so uncomfortable and it ruined our entire shopping experience. Felt like we were being racially profiled and we were being watched. We weren't doing anything suspicious, we genuinely wanted to shop. My family and I left feeling so unhappy with our entire experience, I don't recommend going there and I don't think we'll be back. The lady had dark complexion and a pony tail in braids. Horrible horrible experience. Ruined my mom's Mother's Day shopping experience as well as ours.

featured_reviews.review_id: Great place to shop both Winners and Home Sense together. Always have good furniture selection. Parking lot is huge so you never need to worry about parking. Also, this place is dog friendly.

places.name: Mark's
places.address: Mark's, 8129 Ontario St, Vancouver, BC V5X 0A7

featured_reviews.review_id: An absolute waste of my time. I went to this store on my one day off (Wednesday the 8th of November), and the staff were incredibly incompetent. I had asked a few of the crew to help me with a few rain jackets and boots, however one of the individuals that had gladly taken my request smelled abhorrent. While she was very friendly, I could not help but turn the other way to take a fresh breath of air. Other than the stench, the store was clean on some sides - and messy on the others. Overall, there are other Mark's warehouses to go to nearby.

featured_reviews.review_id: People never come for help need to search for the assistance. If u need anything need to wait for longer time. They never show up. They are just not helpful
featured_reviews.review_text: People never come for help need to search for the assistance. If u need anything need to wait for longer time. They never show up. They are just not helpful

featured_reviews.review_id: Went in to buy some work pants, needed to use a change room but there was nobody in the store except the one employee at the cash register. Had to wait in line at the checkout for the key to the change rooms. When I went to check out they tried to charge me $10 more than the sticker price. When I mentioned that the price didn't look right, the employee double checked the screen and said the price was $114.99. I pointed to the sticker on the pants and showed her that it said $104.99. She scanned the sticker with her scanner and said "the system says it's $114.99, someone must have forgotten to change the sticker". I mentioned that it should be sold for the advertised price and she said the price was already raised in the system, so that's how much it costs. I told her that I'm not interested in buying it then. These guys are raising prices faster than they can change the stickers and taking advantage of that to rip customers off, hoping they won't notice. Very unprofessional, customers are not valued here.
featured_reviews.review_text: Went in to buy some work pants, needed to use a change room but there was nobody in the store except the one employee at the cash register. Had to wait in line at the checkout for the key to the change rooms. When I went to check out they tried to charge me $10 more than the sticker price. When I mentioned that the price didn't look right, the employee double checked the screen and said the price was $114.99. I pointed to the sticker on the pants and showed her that it said $104.99. She scanned the sticker with her scanner and said "the system says it's $114.99, someone must have forgotten to change the sticker". I mentioned that it should be sold for the advertised price and she said the price was already raised in the system, so that's how much it costs. I told her that I'm not interested in buying it then. These guys are raising prices faster than they can change the stickers and taking advantage of that to rip customers off, hoping they won't notice. Very unprofessional, customers are not valued here.

DO NOT SHOP HERE!

They wouldn't honour their online sale price then accused me of wearing their product outdoors and refusing to refund me.
I received the product by shipping less than an hour ago and only tried them on in my house.
The shoes were clearly used and had oil stains on the side.

The customer service by their manager was horrible.

DO NOT SHOP HERE!
